snippet: Valerie Jarrett, a senior White House adviser with unmatched access to the Obamas, has been a driving force in some of the most significant domestic policy decisions of the president’s first term.
abstract: Valerie Jarrett, a senior White House adviser with unmatched access to the Obamas due to their close friendship, has been a driving force in some of the most significant domestic policy decisions of Pres Obama's first term; although her official job is somewhat vague, her standing in the White House is clear to both her detractors and supporters.
lead_paragraph: Valerie Jarrett, a senior White House adviser with unmatched access to the Obamas, has been a driving force in some of the most significant domestic policy decisions of the president’s first term.

headline.seo: Valerie Jarrett Is the Other Power in the West Wing
headline.main: The Other Power in the West Wing
headline.print_headline: The Other Power in the West Wing
